text: David Cliche (July 10, 1952 - July 19, 2020) was a Canadian politician. He represented Vimont in the National Assembly of Quebec from 1994 to 2002. He was a member of the Parti Québécois. After leaving politics, he became an environmental businessman. Cliche was born in Saint-Joseph-de-Beauce, Quebec. Cliche died of brain cancer on July 19, 2020 at his home in Saint-Étienne-de- Bolton, Quebec, aged 68.Décès de l’ancien ministre David Cliche ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian businesspeople Category:Canadian environmentalists Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Politicians from Quebec Category:Cancer deaths in Canada
title: David Cliche
